name: CluedInExportVocabulariesTask
description: Task for Exporting Vocabularies to Json Files
author: Robert Brown

inputs.name: cluedinUsername
inputs.label: CluedIn Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the username used to access the CluedIn App Isntance

inputs.name: cluedinPassword
inputs.label: CluedIn Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the username used to access the CluedIn App Isntance

inputs.name: cluedinClientId
inputs.label: CluedIn ClientId
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the ClientId of the CluedIn App

inputs.name: cluedinHostname
inputs.label: CluedIn Hostname
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the Hostname the CluedIn App Instance

inputs.name: outputPath
inputs.label: output path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the path where to output the data

inputs.name: vocabularyNames
inputs.label: Vocabulary Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter a comma selarated list of vocabulary names to export, * to export all values
